name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jamaar RICHARDSON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jamaar RICHARDSON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of December, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 122(B). Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 15 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
34 A.3d 65
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jamaar RICHARDSON, Petitioner.
No. 87 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 13, 2011.
